summary: <summary>   <purpose>The index.ts file serves as the main entry point for the application, exporting key types, error handling mechanisms, patterns, and file system utilities for use across the codebase.</purpose>   <key_components>     - Directory-related types     - Custom error classes and an error handling function     - Ignore patterns and a pattern matching utility     - File path utilities, file readers, and directory scanners   </key_components>   <dependencies>     - No external npm dependencies     - Peer dependencies: N/A   </dependencies>   <unique_characteristics>     - Centralizes common functionality as named exports     - Provides a consistent interface for accessing critical components     - Allows selective importing of required functionality   </unique_characteristics>   <methods>     - getDirectoryStructure     - CustomError     - errorHandler     - ignorePatterns     - patternMatcher     - joinPath     - readFile     - scanDirectory   </methods>   <exports if any>     - Directory-related types     - Custom error classes (CustomError, ErrorWithCode)     - errorHandler function     - ignorePatterns     - patternMatcher     - pathUtils (joinPath)     - fileReader (readFile)     - directoryScanner (scanDirectory)   </exports if any> </summary>
